name: Into the unkown
description:
Into the Unknown is a puzzle game with a Sci-fi history atmosphere. In the game the player can control two main characters to solve puzzles throughout all the stages. Aside from the main characters, there is one vehicle which can be used to move from one land station to another. On each of the stations the player will find puzzles to be solved in order to understand the game and to figure out the mystery about the planet.

PS: The game is a College's project.  Therefore this game is Open Source and you may find all the references and source code on the link below: 

https://github.com/philipe-go/Unity3D-GameProject-3
